channel.title: The Other Cooking Tools on Cooking
channel.description: Recent content in The Other Cooking Tools on Cooking

item.title: Cooking Item: Poached Egg Cups
item.description: Bought these during one of Amazon’s Cyber Monday deals. They work good for me and can be used in an Instant Pot too. However, I stopped using the Instant Pot with them, because it is hard to dial in the doneness and it is way overkill to use a pressure cooking poached eggs anyways. Now, with the whole egg still in the shell pressure cookers are great for soft and hard boiled eggs.
